version.description: The version number of the package; see distutils.version

description.description: A single line describing the package

author.description: The name of the package author

author_email.description: The email address of the package author

maintainer.description: The name of the current maintainer, if different from the author

maintainer_email.description: The email address of the current maintainer, if different from the author

download_url.description: A URL to download the package

packages.description: A list of Python packages that distutils will manipulate

py_modules.description: A list of Python modules that distutils will manipulate

scripts.description: A list of standalone script files to be built and installed
